descriptionNullable:
**Description**
This dataset includes yellow race, black race, white race and Indian people. In order to be more challenging, the data includes multiple scenes, multiple poses, different ages, light conditions and complicated expressions. This data can be used for tasks such as face detection and face recognition.
For more details, please visit: https://www.nexdata.ai/datasets/973?source=Kaggle

**Specifications**
Data size
28,565 people, 7 images for each people, in total 199,955 images
Population distribution
race distribution: 20,426 Asians, 3,514 Caucasians, 3,722 Blacks, and 903 brown (Mexicans) people; gender distribution: male 15,166, female 13,399; age distribution: from child to the elderly, the young people and the middle aged are the majorities
Collection environment
including indoor and outdoor scenes
Collection diversity
different facial postures, different expressions, different light conditions, different scenes
Collection device
cellphone, camera
Image Parameter
the image data format are .jpg, .jpeg, png
Accuracy
the accuracy exceeds 97% based on the accuracy of expressions; the accuracy of expression naming is more than 97%

**Get the Dataset**
This is just an example of the data. To access more sample data or request the price, contact us  at info@nexdata.ai
title: Multi-race 7 Expressions Recognition Data
